TargetName: SOW-0503 - Security and camera system for main building (interior and exterior)
Statement: DEL-05-04 implements scope item SOW-0503: Optional priced item for security and camera system for main building including installation costs and monitoring costs separately.
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition: SOW-0503 maps to PKG-005 / DEL-05-04_Optional-Security-and-Cameras.

TargetName: OBJ-010 - Transparent separable pricing for optional scope items
Statement: DEL-05-04 traces to objective OBJ-010: Provide transparent separable pricing for optional scope items.
Notes: FACT. Confirmed in decomposition: DEL-05-04 supports OBJ-010.

TargetName: DEL-02-01 Architectural Program Layout & Code Planning
Statement: Camera placement requires the main building architectural layout and site plan from DEL-02-01 to identify interior zones and exterior perimeter.
EvidenceQuote: Completion of the main building architectural layout and site plan (DEL-02-01) to the degree needed to identify interior zones
Notes: FACT. Explicit prerequisite stated in Procedure prerequisites for proposal production.

TargetName: DEL-02-06 Electrical Power Lighting IT-Telecom & PA
Statement: Security and camera system requires coordination with IT/telecommunications infrastructure (DEL-02-06) for system compatibility including network integration VLAN and PoE.
EvidenceQuote: Understanding of the IT/telecommunications infrastructure being proposed for the main building (DEL-02-06 OSR ยง10.6)
Notes: FACT. Stated as prerequisite for proposal production and reinforced in Datasheet (Network Integration), Specification REQ-007, and Procedure Step B-2 (post-award detailed design).

Statement: Pricing submission for this optional item must follow the Appendix H Financial Proposal template format.
EvidenceQuote: Access to the Appendix H Financial Proposal template (RFP Appendix H pages 57-59 of 72) for pricing format
Notes: FACT. Explicit prerequisite for pricing format compliance.

Statement: If both options are elected the security/camera system design should coordinate integration points with the access control system (DEL-05-03).
EvidenceQuote: Approved access control system design (DEL-05-03) if also elected to coordinate integration points
Notes: FACT. Conditional interface: applies only if Owner elects both DEL-05-03 and DEL-05-04. Guidance C-05 confirms integration is possible but not required by OSR.
